trans-unit.source: Step 5: Configure an XML Request-Reply Bridge
trans-unit.target: Step 5: Configure an XML Request-Reply Bridge

trans-unit.source: Lists the steps to configure an <token>request_response</token>.
trans-unit.target: Lists the steps to configure an <token>request_response</token>.

trans-unit.source: The bridge receives XML sales order messages sent from Contoso.
trans-unit.target: The bridge receives XML sales order messages sent from Contoso.

trans-unit.source: To configure a bridge for the scenario in this tutorial, you must:
trans-unit.target: To configure a bridge for the scenario in this tutorial, you must:

trans-unit.source: The bridge must validate all incoming XML messages against the <embeddedLabel>ECommerceSalesOrder.xsd</embeddedLabel> schema.
trans-unit.target: The bridge must validate all incoming XML messages against the <embeddedLabel>ECommerceSalesOrder.xsd</embeddedLabel> schema.

trans-unit.source: This is the schema in which Northwind expects Contoso to send sales order messages.
trans-unit.target: This is the schema in which Northwind expects Contoso to send sales order messages.

trans-unit.source: The bridge must transform the message in <embeddedLabel>ECommerceSalesOrder</embeddedLabel> schema to the schema for inserting data into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> SQL Server table.
trans-unit.target: The bridge must transform the message in <embeddedLabel>ECommerceSalesOrder</embeddedLabel> schema to the schema for inserting data into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> SQL Server table.

trans-unit.source: To do so, the bridge must use the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder_SQL</embeddedLabel> <token>transform</token>.
trans-unit.target: To do so, the bridge must use the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder_SQL</embeddedLabel> <token>transform</token>.

trans-unit.source: The bridge must route the message to the <token>lobrelay</token> endpoint.
trans-unit.target: The bridge must route the message to the <token>lobrelay</token> endpoint.

trans-unit.source: While routing the message, the bridge must also include the relevant headers that must be added to successfully insert messages into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table.
trans-unit.target: While routing the message, the bridge must also include the relevant headers that must be added to successfully insert messages into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table.

trans-unit.source: This topic lists the steps to achieve these tasks as part of a <token>bridge</token> configuration.
trans-unit.target: This topic lists the steps to achieve these tasks as part of a <token>bridge</token> configuration.

trans-unit.source: To configure the <token>request_response</token>
trans-unit.target: To configure the <token>request_response</token>

trans-unit.source: Double click on the .bcs file in the <embeddedLabel>EAIEDITutorial</embeddedLabel> project to open the message flow.
trans-unit.target: Double click on the .bcs file in the <embeddedLabel>EAIEDITutorial</embeddedLabel> project to open the message flow.

trans-unit.source: Right-click anywhere on the design area and select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click anywhere on the design area and select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service URL</embeddedLabel> property, verify that you have the <token>af_integration</token> URL entered.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service URL</embeddedLabel> property, verify that you have the <token>af_integration</token> URL entered.

trans-unit.source: This is the name that you entered in <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=211879</linkUri></externalLink> when creating the <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: This is the name that you entered in <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=211879</linkUri></externalLink> when creating the <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: Right click the <token>lobtarget</token> (added in <link xlink:href="0594fc19-ebfa-4484-b6ef-3e8cdaf1cdc0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Step 3: Create and Configure LOB Targets</link>) and select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Right click the <token>lobtarget</token> (added in <link xlink:href="0594fc19-ebfa-4484-b6ef-3e8cdaf1cdc0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Step 3: Create and Configure LOB Targets</link>) and select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Under <embeddedLabel>Operations</embeddedLabel> tab, copy the value of the first operation and save it to a notepad.
trans-unit.target: Under <embeddedLabel>Operations</embeddedLabel> tab, copy the value of the first operation and save it to a notepad.

trans-unit.source: This value is used later.
trans-unit.target: This value is used later.

trans-unit.source: For this tutorial, the value is <codeInline>TableOp/Insert/dbo/SalesOrder</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: For this tutorial, the value is <codeInline>TableOp/Insert/dbo/SalesOrder</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop an <token>request_response</token> from toolbox to the message flow area.
trans-unit.target: Drag and drop an <token>request_response</token> from toolbox to the message flow area.

trans-unit.source: You use a <token>request_response</token> to send the response back to the client that the sales order data is inserted successfully in the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table.
trans-unit.target: You use a <token>request_response</token> to send the response back to the client that the sales order data is inserted successfully in the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table.

trans-unit.source: Configure the <token>request_response</token>:
trans-unit.target: Configure the <token>request_response</token>:

trans-unit.source: Double-click the <token>request_response</token> on the message flow area.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the <token>request_response</token> on the message flow area.

trans-unit.source: Add the request and response schemas to the <embeddedLabel>Message Type</embeddedLabel> box:
trans-unit.target: Add the request and response schemas to the <embeddedLabel>Message Type</embeddedLabel> box:

trans-unit.source: Request schema
trans-unit.target: Request schema

trans-unit.source: SalesOrder (with the namespace <codeInline>http://ECommerceSalesOrder.Inbound</codeInline>)
trans-unit.target: SalesOrder (with the namespace <codeInline>http://ECommerceSalesOrder.Inbound</codeInline>)

trans-unit.source: Response schema
trans-unit.target: Response schema

trans-unit.source: InsertResponse
trans-unit.target: InsertResponse

trans-unit.source: To add request and response schemas, see <link xlink:href="7e5fedb4-9ab1-4470-aa8a-204633391da7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">XML Request-Reply Bridge : Configuring the Enrich Stage for the Response Message</link>.
trans-unit.target: To add request and response schemas, see <link xlink:href="7e5fedb4-9ab1-4470-aa8a-204633391da7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">XML Request-Reply Bridge : Configuring the Enrich Stage for the Response Message</link>.

trans-unit.source: Add the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder_SQL</embeddedLabel> transform to the <token>transform</token>s stage in the request path of the <token>bridge</token>.
trans-unit.target: Add the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder_SQL</embeddedLabel> transform to the <token>transform</token>s stage in the request path of the <token>bridge</token>.

trans-unit.source: Select the <embeddedLabel>XmlTransform</embeddedLabel> activity under <token>transform</token> stage.
trans-unit.target: Select the <embeddedLabel>XmlTransform</embeddedLabel> activity under <token>transform</token> stage.

trans-unit.source: In Properties, select the ellipsis <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> button next to the <embeddedLabel>Maps</embeddedLabel> property.
trans-unit.target: In Properties, select the ellipsis <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> button next to the <embeddedLabel>Maps</embeddedLabel> property.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Maps Selection</embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder_SQL.trfm</embeddedLabel> <token>transform</token> and select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Maps Selection</embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder_SQL.trfm</embeddedLabel> <token>transform</token> and select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The selected map is now reflected in the <token>bridge</token> configuration.
trans-unit.target: The selected map is now reflected in the <token>bridge</token> configuration.

trans-unit.source: Leave everything else in the <token>bridge</token> configuration to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Leave everything else in the <token>bridge</token> configuration to its default value.

trans-unit.source: Go back to the message flow area (MessageFlowItinerary.bcs).
trans-unit.target: Go back to the message flow area (MessageFlowItinerary.bcs).

trans-unit.source: Select the <embeddedLabel>Connector</embeddedLabel> in the toolbox and join the <token>request_response</token> and <embeddedLabel>orderprocessing_sqlgetorder</embeddedLabel> entity.
trans-unit.target: Select the <embeddedLabel>Connector</embeddedLabel> in the toolbox and join the <token>request_response</token> and <embeddedLabel>orderprocessing_sqlgetorder</embeddedLabel> entity.

trans-unit.source: Set the filter condition on the connector between the <token>bridge</token> and the <token>lobrelay</token> entity.
trans-unit.target: Set the filter condition on the connector between the <token>bridge</token> and the <token>lobrelay</token> entity.

trans-unit.source: The business process between Contoso and Northwind does not include any condition, like only specific messages must be inserted into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table.
trans-unit.target: The business process between Contoso and Northwind does not include any condition, like only specific messages must be inserted into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table.

trans-unit.source: Hence, the filter condition must allow all messages to go through.
trans-unit.target: Hence, the filter condition must allow all messages to go through.

trans-unit.source: Select the connector between <token>request_response</token> and the <token>lobtarget</token> entity.
trans-unit.target: Select the connector between <token>request_response</token> and the <token>lobtarget</token> entity.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, select the ellipsis <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> button for <embeddedLabel>Filter Condition</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, select the ellipsis <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> button for <embeddedLabel>Filter Condition</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Route Filter Configuration</embeddedLabel>, set the filter condition to <embeddedLabel>Match All</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Route Filter Configuration</embeddedLabel>, set the filter condition to <embeddedLabel>Match All</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: To insert data into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table using the XML message, the message header must include the <embeddedLabel>Action</embeddedLabel> SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: To insert data into the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table using the XML message, the message header must include the <embeddedLabel>Action</embeddedLabel> SOAP header.

trans-unit.source: You can set headers on the messages being sent from a <token>bridge</token> using the Route action property, which is available on the connector between the <token>bridge</token> and the <token>lobrelay</token>.
trans-unit.target: You can set headers on the messages being sent from a <token>bridge</token> using the Route action property, which is available on the connector between the <token>bridge</token> and the <token>lobrelay</token>.

trans-unit.source: On the message flow area, select the connector between <token>request_response</token> and the <embeddedLabel>orderprocessing_sqlgetorder</embeddedLabel> entity.
trans-unit.target: On the message flow area, select the connector between <token>request_response</token> and the <embeddedLabel>orderprocessing_sqlgetorder</embeddedLabel> entity.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, select the ellipsis <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> button for <embeddedLabel>Route Action</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, select the ellipsis <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> button for <embeddedLabel>Route Action</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Route Actions</embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel> to open the <embeddedLabel>Add Route Action</embeddedLabel> dialog box.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Route Actions</embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel> to open the <embeddedLabel>Add Route Action</embeddedLabel> dialog box.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Add Route Action</embeddedLabel>, set the properties as shown in the following table:
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Add Route Action</embeddedLabel>, set the properties as shown in the following table:

trans-unit.source: Under Property (Read From)
trans-unit.target: Under Property (Read From)

trans-unit.source: Expression
trans-unit.target: Expression

trans-unit.source: Set this to <codeInline>TableOp/Insert/dbo/SalesOrder</codeInline>
trans-unit.target: Set this to <codeInline>TableOp/Insert/dbo/SalesOrder</codeInline>

trans-unit.source: Always enter the value for an expression within single quotes.
trans-unit.target: Always enter the value for an expression within single quotes.

trans-unit.source: Under Destination (Write-To)
trans-unit.target: Under Destination (Write-To)

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: Type

trans-unit.source: Set this to SOAP.
trans-unit.target: Set this to SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Identifier
trans-unit.target: Identifier

trans-unit.source: Set this to Action.
trans-unit.target: Set this to Action.

trans-unit.source: With this configuration, when the <token>bridge</token> routes the message to the <token>lobrelay</token>, the message includes an <embeddedLabel>Action</embeddedLabel> header and the value of the header is set to <legacyItalic>TableOp/Insert/dbo/SalesOrder</legacyItalic>; which is the action required to insert a message in the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table.
trans-unit.target: With this configuration, when the <token>bridge</token> routes the message to the <token>lobrelay</token>, the message includes an <embeddedLabel>Action</embeddedLabel> header and the value of the header is set to <legacyItalic>TableOp/Insert/dbo/SalesOrder</legacyItalic>; which is the action required to insert a message in the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> table.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel> in the <embeddedLabel>Add Route Action</embeddedLabel> and the <embeddedLabel>Route Actions</embeddedLabel> windows.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel> in the <embeddedLabel>Add Route Action</embeddedLabel> and the <embeddedLabel>Route Actions</embeddedLabel> windows.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Save</embeddedLabel> to save changes to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Save</embeddedLabel> to save changes to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
